short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Doge The Asteriod using the arrow keys

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This game allows user to doge incoming asteroids while they pick up speed over time. While you doge the asteroids your score will go up, the higher the score goes the better your doing! Enjoy have fun!
